sense.def:
Na sodišču je
a verdict
odločitev glede tega, ali je obtoženec kriv ali ne.

seg.quote: The jury gave a verdict of not guilty.

sense.def:
One's verdict on something
je človekovo mnenje o nečem, ki si ga ustvari potem, ko o tistem razmisli.

seg.quote: The critics hated the film, but the public verdict was favourable.
